Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.systems

Interface IVisualiseSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
J2DAVisualiseSystem, J2DIVisualiseSystem, J2DPVisualiseSystem
public interface IVisualiseSystem
Base visualisation system interface that must be inherited by other visualisation system classes
An interface to define all base visualisation methods

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    end()
    Method to end all visualisation instances.
    void
    visualise(String title, String... lines)
    Method to visualise the intermediate game screen.
    void
    visualise(List<AVisualComp> components, int score, int lives)
    Method to visualise the active game screen; containing the entities that must be visualised, the total score and the player lives.

  • Method Details

    • visualise

      void visualise(List<AVisualComp> components, int score, int lives)
      Method to visualise the active game screen; containing the entities that must be visualised, the total score and the player lives.
      Parameters:
      components - list of all entities their visualisation components
      score - an integer that specifies the total score of the game
      lives - an integer that specifies the players life total
      See Also:
      • AVisualComp

    • visualise

      void visualise(String title, String... lines)
      Method to visualise the intermediate game screen.
      Parameters:
      title - a sting that represents the title of the screen
      lines - a list of stings that contain all text lines of the screen

    • end

      void end()
      Method to end all visualisation instances.
